title: Broken Banners
description: Slaughtered and left for crows, soldiers of the King’s Army lay dead in a field. A grim reminder: the king’s law ends at the gates of the capital. Elinor fought for what she believed and now she is an outcast. No soldier will follow her. No officer will stand with her. Yet when she finds her brothers and sisters slaughtered, she cannot turn her back on them. Long ago, they swore an oath. Not to the king, but to each other. And woe to those who break that bond.
author: Mark Gelineau
